import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent { }

Welcome to Smart Scheduling!

Streamline your academic journey with our user-friendly schedule generator. Say goodbye to course selection hassles and hello to effortless planning. Simplify your student life with us today

HOW TO USE

1. Explore Courses (Press "Courses")
2. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Mollitia, excepturi.
